biotools.summary:
universal amplicon sequencing on Illumina platforms (TaggiMatrix).

This is a very simple way to create locus-specific fusion primers that can be used in conjunction with iTru primers of Glenn et al. 2016 [https://www.biorxiv.org/content/early/2016/06/15/049114] to create dual or quadruple indexed amplicons ready for sequencing on Illumina instruments.

You need to have Google Chrome or Safari browser only.

bioschemas.name: tools-taggi
